# General Instructions for GitHub Copilot

When generating code or text, please adhere to the following guidelines:
- Keep communication concise and focused.
- Follow development best practices.
- Follow UI/UX design principles.
- Follow keyboard first design principles.
- Prioritize user privacy and data security.
- Ensure accessibility for all users.
- Make regular commits to document progress.
- Commit changes with clear and descriptive messages.
